ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload

validation:is-not-null.value: #[payload != null and (payload.firstName != null and payload.lastName != null and payload.emailId != null and payload.phoneNo !=null and payload.password != null)]
validation:is-not-null.message: Please provide all required field values

on-error-continue.doc:name: On Error Continue
on-error-continue.type: USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:BAD_REQUEST, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:NOT_ACCEPTABLE, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:PARSING, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:SECURITY, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:TIMEOUT, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:TOO_MANY_REQUESTS, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:UNAUTHORIZED, USER-AUTHORISATION-SAPI:UNSUPPORTED_MEDIA_TYPE, EXPRESSION, STREAM_MAXIMUM_SIZE_EXCEEDED

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "Error Type": error.errorType.identifier, "Error Message": error.errorMessage.payload, "Error Description": error.detailedDescription }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "Message": "Customer Registered Successfully", "UserID": vars.authPayload.'id' }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "firstName": payload.firstName, "lastName": payload.lastName, "emailId": payload.emailId, "phoneNo": payload.phoneNo, "customerId": vars.authPayload.'id' }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "Error Type": error.errorType.identifier, "Error Message": error.errorMessage.payload, "Error Description": error.detailedDescription }

json-logger:logger.message: User Train Delay Default Error Logger

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- payload

ee:message.ee:set-payload:
%dw 2.0
import * from dw::core::Binaries
output application/json
var at = vars.auth default ""
---
{
emailId: (fromBase64(at replace "Basic " with "") splitBy(':'))[0], password: (fromBase64(at replace "Basic " with "") splitBy(':'))[1]
}

when.expression: #[vars.authPayload != null and vars.authPayload.'userid' != null and vars.authPayload.'userid' as String == vars.custId as String]
